name: The Invisible Hand (itch)
description:
The Invisible Hand is a fantasy themed resource/economy/shop management game, developed by members of UCI's Video Game Development Club.

Credits:

Henry Smith - Programmer and Project Lead

Krishen Bhan - Programmer

Danielle Mariano - Artist

Hiroshi Estrada - Producer

Matt Robertson - Writer

Additionally, every member of the team contributed to different stages of the design of the game.
